short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal notepad for jotting down quick notes for the short term.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimal notepad for jotting down quick notes and memos for the short term.  Syncs across all devices using your Google account.

Original Intended use with ChromeOS.
Does not support saving and editing files.
